entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
